cards.tarot_imply_en: New Beginnings, Spontaneity, Leap of Faith, Innocence, Limitless Potential
cards.standalone_past_en: You have recently taken a significant leap of faith or embarked on a path others might deem risky. By shedding old emotional baggage, you stepped into the unknown with nothing but trust in the universe, finding a sense of freedom you hadn't felt in ages.
cards.standalone_present_en: The universe is daring you to jump! This is not the moment for over-analysis, but for trusting your instincts and embracing excitement like a cat spotting an open door. A fresh opportunity awaits right in front of you; you only need the courage to step forward without the fear of falling.
cards.standalone_future_en: A brand new adventure is waiting on the horizon. Prepare for unexpected twists and a journey that will permanently shift your perspective. You are about to reclaim a childlike wonder, enjoying the vast world free from old worries and rigid boundaries.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Bold choices from your past have led you to a precipice where trust in destiny is required once more. The gates of possibility are swinging open, inviting you to explore. Your future holds freshness and limitless learning.
cards.love_past_en: You may have recently started a whirlwind romance or just broke free from stifling commitments with a sigh of relief.
cards.love_present_en: Love right now is like a playful kitten‚Äîfun, exciting, and unpredictable. Don't demand seriousness yet; just enjoy the moment.
cards.love_future_en: You will encounter love when you least expect it, possibly with someone completely outside your usual 'type'.
cards.career_past_en: You might have just quit a stable job or started a side project without a fully fleshed-out business plan.
cards.career_present_en: Fresh ideas are flowing; this is the prime time to initiate something you've never done before, led by creativity.
cards.career_future_en: A new career path will unfold, possibly a complete industry shift or discovering a passion that excites you every morning.
cards.finance_past_en: You have previously spent impulsively or taken financial risks without much forethought.
cards.finance_present_en: Be wary of impulse spending, but if it's an investment in learning or new experiences, it's worth it.
cards.finance_future_en: New financial opportunities will arrive through sheer luck or from channels you hadn't considered.
cards.action_prompt_en: Do the thing you are afraid to do. Take the first step now and ignore the plan!
cards.reflection_question_en: If you knew you wouldn't get hurt falling, what would you dare to do today?
cards.affirmation_en: I leap into the unknown with a joyful heart.
cards.timing_hint: When you least expect it / During Aquarius season
cards.hook_en: Ready to throw away the map and get wonderfully lost?
cards.ritual_2min_en: Do something 'out of character' right now, like wearing mismatched socks or taking a completely new route home, to awaken your inner playful spirit.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
List one thing you've always wanted to do but feared looking foolish doing.
Write it down.
Then ask yourself: 'So what?'
cards.keywords_light: Innocence, New beginnings, Freedom, Adventure, Spontaneity, Trust
cards.image_alt_en: A fluffy white kitten standing at the edge of a cliff, gazing at a butterfly, with a small knapsack on a stick, symbolizing innocent adventure.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A fearless white kitten standing on a cliff edge carrying a small bindle on a stick, looking at a white sun and chasing a butterfly, tarot card composition, art nouveau style, whimsical, intricate gold outlines, vibrant colors --ar 2:3
cards.meta_description_en: Discover the meaning of The Fool tarot card with Meow Tarot: A symbol of new beginnings, freedom, and the courage to leap into the unknown.

cards.standalone_past_en: You have diligently mastered your skills and gathered valuable resources in the past. These experiences are the potent ingredients you've stored, ready to be used for your next great creation.
cards.standalone_present_en: The stage is yours right now! You possess every tool and resource you need, so there is no need to wait. Channel your focus and willpower to transform your abstract dreams into tangible reality.
cards.standalone_future_en: Success through direct action awaits you. The future holds a period where you can steer your life exactly as you wish, provided you trust in your potential and execute your plans strategically.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: The skills you mastered in the past have perfectly prepared you for this moment of high potential. Now is the golden opportunity to act and manifest your vision, leading to a self-determined and successful future.
cards.love_past_en: You likely initiated the connection or used your charm to attract attention in past relationships.
cards.love_present_en: You have the power to steer your love life; if single, your confidence can manifest the right partner now.
cards.love_future_en: Your relationship will evolve exactly as you intend to create it, driven by clear and conscious actions.
cards.career_past_en: You used wit and resourcefulness to navigate crises or single-handedly launched a project.
cards.career_present_en: The spotlight is on your skills; use everything in your arsenal to drive results. You are the key player.
cards.career_future_en: You will succeed in building your own business or project; career advancement is firmly in your hands.
cards.finance_past_en: You managed to generate income through unique talents or opportunities others missed.
cards.finance_present_en: Everything you touch can turn to gold if you apply your knowledge and creativity correctly.
cards.finance_future_en: Investments or new income streams will succeed due to your own planning and execution.
cards.action_prompt_en: Pick up your wand! Every tool is already in your paws; start manifesting exactly what you want right now.
cards.reflection_question_en: What hidden talent do you possess but are still hesitant to use?
cards.affirmation_en: I am the creator of my world, and I have the power to make anything happen.
cards.hook_en: Stop looking elsewhere for miracles; you are the miracle maker, kitty.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Organize your workspace. Place items representing the 4 elements (Earth, Water, Air, Fire) in front of you, and focus your intent on a single goal.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
List 3 skills you are best at.
What is one thing you want to accomplish this week?
What resource do you already have but forget to use?
cards.keywords_shadow: manipulation, poor planning, untapped talent, trickery, illusion
cards.image_alt_en: A confident tabby cat standing on hind legs behind a table with magical tools: a cup, a sword, a wand, and a pentacle. One paw points to the sky, the other to the ground.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A mystical tarot card illustration of a confident tabby cat standing on hind legs behind a wooden table featuring a cup, a sword, a wand, and a pentacle, one paw pointing up and one down, infinity symbol floating above head, lush garden background with roses and lilies, art nouveau style, gold accents.
cards.meta_description_en: The Magician Tarot meaning by MeowTarot: Unlock your manifestation power and skill. Discover how to turn your dreams into reality with this powerful card.

cards.tarot_imply_en: intuition, mystery, subconscious, inner wisdom, stillness
cards.standalone_past_en: You have passed through a time of silence and retreat to reflect on your inner feelings, or perhaps uncovered a secret that shifted your perspective. Past stillness was your shield.
cards.standalone_present_en: The answer you seek is not outside, but within your deep intuition. Stop relying solely on logic for a moment and listen to that quiet inner whisper that is almost always right.
cards.standalone_future_en: Hidden truths are about to surface, or you will experience a spiritual leveling-up. The near future sees the fog lifting, allowing you to see everything clearly with your third eye.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Past stillness has primed you for a present that requires intuition over logic. If you quiet yourself to listen within, the future will miraculously reveal the truths you need to know.
cards.love_past_en: There may have been a secret romance or feelings kept deep inside without being spoken.
cards.love_present_en: Trust your first impression when looking into someone's eyes; if something feels off, step back and observe.
cards.love_future_en: A profound spiritual connection awaits, or secrets between you will be unveiled.
cards.career_past_en: You worked behind the scenes or possessed insider knowledge that gave you an advantage.
cards.career_present_en: Don't rush to speak up or reveal all your plans; keep your ace card hidden and wait to see how things unfold.
cards.career_future_en: You will discover a new path or vision that others overlook, bringing quiet success.
cards.finance_past_en: Past financial decisions relied more on gut feelings than numbers, and they were often right.
cards.finance_present_en: Check contracts carefully; there might be hidden clauses you don't see at first glance.
cards.finance_future_en: Financial opportunities will come in unadvertised forms or require insider knowledge.
cards.action_prompt_en: Be still like a cat stalking prey. Stop speaking, and use your spiritual eyes to see through the surface.
cards.reflection_question_en: What truth do you know deep down but are pretending not to see?
cards.affirmation_en: I trust the whisper of my intuition.
cards.hook_en: Secrets aren't for speaking, but for feeling... do you hear that sound?
cards.ritual_2min_en: Find a quiet spot, light a white candle, close your eyes, and focus on your breath. Ask one question internally and wait for the first answer that arises without logic.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What was your last memorable dream, and what is it trying to tell you?
What is your intuition warning you about right now?
What secret should you keep to yourself?
cards.keywords_light: intuition, unconscious, inner voice, spirituality, mystery
cards.keywords_shadow: secrets, withheld information, repression, moodiness, deceit
cards.image_alt_en: A mystical black cat with glowing eyes sitting calmly between two ancient pillars, wearing a moon crown and a veil, with pomegranates in the background.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A mystical tarot card illustration of a sleek black cat with glowing eyes sitting regally between a black and a white pillar, wearing a crescent moon crown and a sheer veil, backdrop of pomegranate tapestries and a crescent moon, night time atmosphere, art nouveau style, silver and blue accents.
cards.meta_description_en: The High Priestess Tarot meaning by MeowTarot: Tap into your intuition and subconscious. Discover secrets and spiritual wisdom hidden within this card.

cards.tarot_imply_en: abundance, attraction, nature, birth, physical pleasure
cards.standalone_past_en: Your recent past was filled with comfort, care, and nurturing. You may have just finished a period of incubating ideas that have now grown beautifully, grounded in love and stability.
cards.standalone_present_en: Life is blooming! This is a time to harvest joy, indulge in the world's beauty, and let creativity flow. You currently possess a magnetic power to effortlessly attract good things.
cards.standalone_future_en: Prepare for good news regarding abundance, whether it's profit from work or expanding your family. Joy, success, and tangible wealth are waiting for you just ahead.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: The love and care you received in the past have empowered your present creativity and joy. Get ready to harvest the beautiful results and abundance that will follow in the future.
cards.love_past_en: Past relationships were filled with warmth and nurturing care, much like a mother's love.
cards.love_present_en: Your charm is irresistible; this is the best time for deep love and building a family.
cards.love_future_en: Love will flourish; there might be good news regarding marriage or a new family member.
cards.career_past_en: You worked in a supportive environment or created beautiful work you are proud of.
cards.career_present_en: Your ideas are about to monetize! Projects related to art, beauty, or nature will thrive.
cards.career_future_en: Your business or career will expand steadily; profits will grow like a well-watered tree.
cards.finance_past_en: You spent money on happiness and comfort, which was an investment in your quality of life.
cards.finance_present_en: Finances are flowing smoothly with plenty to spare, but don't forget to share with others.
cards.finance_future_en: Wealth will continue to accumulate; you will have enough resources to care for everyone you love.
cards.action_prompt_en: Go eat something delicious or walk in a garden right now! Be as kind to yourself as possible.
cards.reflection_question_en: What project or idea are you currently 'birthing' into this world?
cards.affirmation_en: I am worthy of all love, beauty, and abundance.
cards.hook_en: The world is always kind to cute cats... and right now, you are that cat.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Place fresh flowers in a vase in your room, or eat fresh fruit slowly, savoring the sweetness to connect with Earth's energy.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
How can you better nurture your body and mind today?
What beauty do you encounter in your daily life?
What do you wish to create and help grow?
cards.keywords_shadow: dependence, smothering, emptiness, creative block, negligence
cards.image_alt_en: A luxurious Persian cat lounging on red velvet cushions in a sunlit garden, wearing a crown of stars, surrounded by wheat and waterfalls.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A luxurious Persian cat lounging on red velvet cushions in a sunlit garden, wearing a crown of twelve stars, surrounded by golden wheat and a waterfall, soft pink roses everywhere, art nouveau style, gold accents, warm lighting.
cards.meta_description_en: The Empress Tarot meaning by MeowTarot: Discover the power of abundance, love, and creativity. Learn what this nurturing card reveals about your life.

cards.tarot_imply_en: authority, structure, stability, responsibility, father figure
cards.standalone_past_en: You have been shaped by discipline or the influence of an authoritative figure, establishing a strong foundation for your life today. Those experiences taught you the value of responsibility.
cards.standalone_present_en: It is time to step up, take the lead, and bring order to chaos. Use logic and reason over emotion to make decisions and establish stability in your own kingdom.
cards.standalone_future_en: Lasting success awaits if you maintain your standards and discipline. You are on track to ascend to a position of authority or gain respect as an expert in your field.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: The discipline and foundations of your past call for leadership in the present. If you stand firm with strength and logic, your future promises success and stability.
cards.love_past_en: Past relationships may have been rule-bound, or one partner held significantly more power.
cards.love_present_en: Love requires clarity and stability, not games; it may indicate a relationship with someone older or very mature.
cards.love_future_en: You will find a serious and stable relationship that could lead to building a strong family foundation.
cards.career_past_en: You worked under strict systems or a demanding boss, which toughened you up significantly.
cards.career_present_en: An opportunity for promotion or leading a major project is here; show your leadership qualities fully.
cards.career_future_en: You will rise to the top of your field or own a business with clear, efficient systems.
cards.finance_past_en: You managed finances with strict discipline, resulting in savings or stable assets.
cards.finance_present_en: Plan finances strictly with a long-term view; control expenses and protect your assets carefully.
cards.finance_future_en: Financial status will be very stable; you will have full authority to direct your assets independently.
cards.action_prompt_en: Stand tall, chin up, and handle the problem decisively! Do not let emotions override logic.
cards.reflection_question_en: Which area of your life lacks discipline and needs urgent management?
cards.affirmation_en: I possess the strength and wisdom to lead my life to success.
cards.hook_en: Who's the boss? You are... but you have to act the part.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Sit on your favorite chair, feet flat, spine straight. Imagine a heavy crown on your head. Breathe slowly to reclaim your authority.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What are 3 iron rules you want to set for yourself?
Who is your role model for leadership?
How can you build stability in your life today?
cards.keywords_shadow: tyranny, rigidity, domination, anger, control freak
cards.image_alt_en: A stern-looking Maine Coon cat sitting on a stone throne adorned with ram heads, wearing a red cape and holding a scepter, with mountains in the background.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A majestic Maine Coon cat sitting on a rugged stone throne carved with ram heads, wearing a regal red cape and holding a golden scepter, rocky mountains in the background, warm sunset lighting, art nouveau style, strong lines.
cards.meta_description_en: The Emperor Tarot meaning by MeowTarot: embody leadership, authority, and structure. Find out what this powerful card says about your stability and success.

cards.standalone_past_en: You were raised within established structures or influenced by a mentor who taught you to follow tradition. Education or social institutions played a key role in shaping your past self.
cards.standalone_present_en: This is not the time to break the rules or go rogue. Seek advice from experts or stick to tried-and-true methods. Joining a group or aligning with an organization will bring you stability.
cards.standalone_future_en: You are stepping into the role of a teacher, or you will find a community that shares your beliefs. The future brings peace through adherence to ethics and moral values.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Strong foundations from past teachings suggest you should stick to established rules for safety now. The future holds the promise of sharing wisdom and finding a supportive spiritual community.
cards.love_past_en: Past love was traditional, perhaps arranged or introduced by elders.
cards.love_present_en: Relationships need clarity and formal commitment. Marriage or serious vows may be on the horizon.
cards.love_future_en: You will build a family or partnership rooted in deeply shared values and beliefs.
cards.career_past_en: You worked in a large, structured organization or had a mentor guiding your career.
cards.career_present_en: Follow company rules and learn from seniors. Don't reinvent the wheel; use proven methods.
cards.career_future_en: You will be respected as an expert in your field, or work in education/religious sectors.
cards.finance_past_en: Conservative financial management; avoiding risks and saving as taught by elders.
cards.finance_present_en: Invest in low-risk, reliable assets. Consulting a professional financial advisor is best.
cards.finance_future_en: Wealth will come from consistent, legal accumulation. There are no shortcuts to riches here.
cards.action_prompt_en: Respect the rules and seek guidance from the wise. Do not be stubborn or go your own way right now.
cards.reflection_question_en: What tradition or belief are you holding onto, and does it still serve your life?
cards.affirmation_en: I learn from ancient wisdom to build a stable future.
cards.hook_en: Even the naughtiest cat sometimes needs to listen to a wise teacher.
cards.ritual_2min_en: Light incense or a candle. Think of a teacher or mentor who guided you. Thank them internally to reconnect with gratitude.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
Who has been the most important 'teacher' in your life?
What values do you want to pass on to the next generation?
What subject do you want to study deeper right now?
cards.keywords_shadow: dogma, rebellion, hypocrisy, blind faith, restriction
cards.image_alt_en: A wise, elderly cat wearing papal robes and a tall crown, sitting on a throne between two pillars, with two smaller kittens kneeling before it seeking guidance.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A wise elderly cat wearing intricate red and white papal robes and a triple crown, sitting on a stone throne between two pillars, holding a golden key, two smaller kittens sitting with backs to viewer listening, stained glass background, art nouveau style.
cards.meta_description_en: The Hierophant Tarot meaning by MeowTarot: Discover wisdom, tradition, and mentorship. Learn what this spiritual card advises for your path.

cards.tarot_imply_en: love, choices, harmony, heart's crossroads, commitment
cards.standalone_past_en: You have navigated a significant crossroads where you made a choice based on your heart's calling rather than logic. That decision fundamentally shifted your life's path and personal values.
cards.standalone_present_en: You are currently facing a 'crossroads' or indulging in a profound connection. It is a moment where your head and heart must come to an agreement to find the perfect balance.
cards.standalone_future_en: Harmony and union await you, whether it's meeting a soulmate or having different aspects of your life align perfectly. You will encounter something that truly fulfills your spirit.
cards.reading_summary_preview_en: Heart-led decisions from the past have brought you to a present need for balance, paving the way for a future filled with deeper love and understanding.
cards.love_past_en: You experienced a love that transformed you, or had to choose between love and something else.
cards.love_present_en: Love is blooming, passionate, and magnetic, or you may face a decision to choose a partner.
cards.love_future_en: Relationships will evolve to a spiritual level, or you will meet a true soulmate with matching vibes.
cards.career_past_en: You chose a career path that aligned with your passion or entered a significant partnership.
cards.career_present_en: You might have to choose passion over pay, or collaborate closely with a colleague.
cards.career_future_en: Joint ventures or teamwork will be highly successful; harmony is your pot of gold.
cards.finance_past_en: Past spending was driven more by emotion and personal satisfaction than logic.
cards.finance_present_en: Expenses related to a partner may arise, or financial decisions affecting others need to be made.
cards.finance_future_en: Finances will improve through cooperation, or investing in what you love will pay off.
cards.action_prompt_en: Listen clearly to your heart and choose the path that feels most authentic. Don't fear the drama.
cards.reflection_question_en: Are you choosing this out of love, or out of fear of being alone?
cards.affirmation_en: I always choose what aligns with my inner truth.
cards.hook_en: Left or right? Heart or head? Which way is the kitty way?
cards.ritual_2min_en: Look in the mirror, gaze into your eyes, and name 3 things you love most. Reaffirm your values, then smile at yourself.
cards.journal_prompt_3lines_en:
What crossroads are you facing right now?
What is a core value you will never trade away?
What is your definition of a 'healthy relationship'?
cards.keywords_shadow: disharmony, imbalance, bad choices, detachment, conflict
cards.image_alt_en: Two affectionate cats, one orange and one black, sitting with tails intertwined under a radiant sun with a benevolent cat-angel spirit floating above.
cards.illustration_prompt_en: A tarot card of two affectionate cats, one orange and one black, sitting with tails intertwined in a lush garden, a large benevolent cat-spirit angel floating above in the clouds, radiant sun rays, red apples on trees, art nouveau style, vibrant colors.
cards.meta_description_en: The Lovers Tarot meaning by MeowTarot: Explore choices of the heart, soulmates, and perfect unions. See what this romantic card reveals for you.
